paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 3.5% of African Americans, especially of Western African origin

individual_records.phenotype_details: heart failure with preserved ejection fraction
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was diagnosed with heart failure at age 64.
This individual presented with significant symptoms of cardiac amyloidosis.
Despite being a carrier, this individual has shown no symptoms.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant is associated with altered protein stability and amyloid fibril formation.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common mutation causing ATTRv-CA in the USA.
key_quotes: Valine-to-isoleucine substitution at position 122 (Val122Ile) is the most common mutation causing ATTRv-CA in the USA.
The true prevalence of ATTR-CA in the population is unknown.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
